Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Glad to hear that you've been enjoying the game. Feel free to share your accomplishments, show off your creations, ask questions (or answer other people's, if you know the answer), and just generally make yourself at home.

Nice emotes. haha

No worries about lurking, but it's also good to hear from the "quiet ones." (I just made that up...)

Welcome to the chattier side of the forums!

Cheers,
